about_the_game:
A Battle for Survival Between Two Dimensions

Welcome to ABSYM, a dark rogue-souls-like that will take you to the edges of reality. Traverse the fragile balance between the decaying world of Nihilor and the corrupted parallel dimension of Absymalith. Face deadly challenges, explore stunning environments, and uncover the secrets of a universe on the brink of collapse. Every step brings you closer to redemption... or total corruption.


A unique system blending the thrill of rogue-like combat with the strategic depth of souls-like exploration. Survive, improve, but remember: every victory comes at a cost.




Shift seamlessly between two dimensions in real time with Rift Dancing. Move between Nihilor, a crumbling world, and Absymalith, a corrupted dimension. Each plane offers unique opportunities and threats that redefine combat and exploration.



Develop your character in two distinct directions:

  • Power up with boons collected in Absymalith.

  • Gain permanent upgrades through your team expertise.

  • Balance power and corruption to suit your playstyle.


Immerse yourself in a breathtaking world featuring HD2D visuals, where 3D environments meet meticulously detailed pixel art characters. Dynamic lighting and contrasting colors between the dimensions create an unforgettable visual identity.




Minimal ambient soundscapes give way to intense orchestral compositions during boss battles. Each fight against the Lords of Corruption is a unique sensory experience, both visually and aurally.


ABSYM offers a semi-linear world packed with secrets to uncover:

Explore the vast ruins of Absygonia, Nihilor’s main city, and its surrounding areas, including the ABSYM mines, the industrial district, and the mysterious alchemy research center.

Each area is designed to incorporate Rift Dancing, unlocking new ways to solve puzzles, combat enemies, and discover hidden paths.




If you love the brutal challenge of a souls-like, the variety of a rogue-like, and a world that invites you to lose yourself in its details, ABSYM is the game you've been waiting for. Prepare to test your skill, your wits, and your ability to resist corruption.

The question isn’t whether you’ll survive, but at what cost.

Add to your wishlist now and get ready to enter the Rift!
